statements: SELECT * FROM player_statistics WHERE player_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
SELECT player_name, game_title, score FROM player_statistics WHERE date_played >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT player_id, game_title, level FROM player_statistics WHERE score > 1000 ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT player_name, game_title, level FROM player_statistics WHERE level BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY level ASC
SELECT player_name, game_title, date_played FROM player_statistics WHERE date_played BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY date_played DESC
SELECT player_name, game_title, score FROM player_statistics WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT game_title, score, date_played FROM player_statistics WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY date_played DESC;
SELECT player_name, level, date_played FROM player_statistics WHERE score BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY level ASC, date_played DESC;
SELECT game_title, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM player_statistics GROUP BY game_title;
SELECT DISTINCT game_title FROM player_statistics WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY game_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_statistics WHERE player_name = 'John Smith'
SELECT player_name, score FROM player_statistics WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT game_name, player_name, score FROM player_statistics WHERE game_name = 'Chess' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT player_id, player_name, score FROM player_statistics ORDER BY player_name ASC, score DESC
SELECT player_name, score FROM player_statistics WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY player_name ASC
SELECT * FROM player_statistics WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT player_name, game_name, score FROM player_statistics WHERE game_name = 'Chess' ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_games FROM player_statistics GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_games > 5 ORDER BY total_games DESC;
SELECT game_name, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM player_statistics GROUP BY game_name;
SELECT player_name, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM player_statistics GROUP BY player_name HAVING total_score > 500 ORDER BY total_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, score FROM PlayerStatistics
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM Game
SELECT player_name, score FROM PlayerStatistics WHERE score > 100
SELECT player_name, score FROM PlayerStatistics ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM Game WHERE release_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT player_name, score FROM PlayerStatistics
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM Game
SELECT player_name, game_name, score FROM PlayerStatistics JOIN Game ON PlayerStatistics.game_id = Game.game_id
SELECT player_name, game_name, score FROM PlayerStatistics JOIN Game ON PlayerStatistics.game_id = Game.game_id WHERE score > 100
SELECT player_name, score FROM PlayerStatistics WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM players WHERE player_score > 100;
SELECT player_name, game_name FROM players p JOIN scores s ON p.player_id = s.player_id JOIN games g ON s.game_id = g.game_id;
SELECT player_name, game_name, score_value FROM players p JOIN scores s ON p.player_id = s.player_id JOIN games g ON s.game_id = g.game_id WHERE score_value >= 500;
SELECT player_name, rank FROM players p JOIN leaderboard l ON p.player_id = l.player_id WHERE rank <= 3;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_score FROM players WHERE player_score > 100 ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT game_id, game_name, release_date FROM games WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT player_name, game_name, score_value FROM players p JOIN scores s ON p.player_id = s.player_id JOIN games g ON s.game_id = g.game_id WHERE score_value > 500 ORDER BY score_value DESC;
SELECT player_name, rank FROM players p JOIN leaderboard l ON p.player_id = l.player_id WHERE rank <= 10 ORDER BY rank ASC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, score_value FROM players JOIN scores ON players.player_id = scores.player_id ORDER BY player_id, score_value DESC;
SELECT player_name, game_score FROM players
SELECT * FROM games WHERE game_id = 1
SELECT player_id, level_name FROM levels WHERE game_id = 2 ORDER BY level_id DESC
SELECT player_id, score FROM player_stats WHERE game_id = 1 ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT player_name, rank, timestamp FROM leaderboard WHERE game_id = 2 ORDER BY rank
SELECT player_name, game_score FROM players
SELECT player_name, game_name FROM players JOIN games ON players.player_id = games.game_id
SELECT * FROM player_stats WHERE score > 100
SELECT player_name, game_name, score FROM players JOIN player_stats ON players.player_id = player_stats.player_id JOIN games ON player_stats.game_id = games.game_id

SELECT player_name, game_name, level_name, score FROM players JOIN player_stats ON players.player_id = player_stats.player_id JOIN games ON player_stats.game_id = games.game_id JOIN levels ON player_stats.level_id = levels.level_id
